participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nostalgic, enjoys sharing memories and engaging in creative activities.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i was born in the early 80s. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Introverted and innovative, often lost in thought but deeply passionate about technology and gaming.
participant_2.background: i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft. i'm working on building a robot to be my body double. i have an allergy to water.
